p: Twelve tilapia samples were purchased from various grocery stores in four different regions of the United States. Samples were collected from the mid-Atlantic (Blacksburg, VA), mid-west (Chicago, IL), northeast (Boston, MA and New York City, NY) and southeast regions (Plano, TX). Data regarding type of culture (wild caught versus farmed raised), country of origins, price, product certification and fish condition were recorded upon purchase ( Table 1). Samples were freeze-dried and stored at -20 Â°C in accordance with United States Environmental Protection Agency (USEPA) guidance for fish tissue analysis [ 18].
